verses.verse: <S%H8451><s%>"'This is the law of the trespass <S%H817>offering.<s%> It is <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy.<s%>

In the <S%H4725>place<s%> where they <S%H7819>kill<s%> the burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> he shall <S%H7819>kill<s%> the trespass <S%H817>offering;<s%> and its <S%H1818>blood<s%> he shall <S%H2236>sprinkle<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>
He shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> all of its <S%H2459>fat:<s%> the fat <S%H451>tail,<s%> and the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that <S%H3680>covers<s%> the <S%H7130>innards,<s%>

and the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3629>kidneys,<s%> and the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that is on <S%H3689>them,<s%> which is by the loins, and the <S%H3508>cover<s%> on the <S%H3516>liver,<s%> with the <S%H3629>kidneys,<s%> shall he take <S%H5493>away;<s%>
and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> them on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> for an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> it is a trespass <S%H817>offering.<s%>
Every <S%H2145>male<s%> among the <S%H3548>priests<s%> may <S%H398>eat<s%> of <S%H398>it.<s%> It shall be eaten in a <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H4725>place.<s%> It is <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6918>holy.<s%>

<S%H2403><s%>"'As is the sin offering, so is the trespass <S%H817>offering;<s%> there is <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8451>law<s%> for <S%H3548>them.<s%> The priest who makes atonement with them shall have <S%H3722>it.<s%>

The <S%H3548>priest<s%> who <S%H7126>offers<s%> any <S%H376>man<s%>'s burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> even the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall have for himself the <S%H5785>skin<s%> of the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> which he has <S%H7126>offered.<s%>

Every meal <S%H4503>offering<s%> that is <S%H644>baked<s%> in the <S%H8574>oven,<s%> and all that is <S%H6213>dressed<s%> in the <S%H4227>pan,<s%> and on the <S%H4227>griddle,<s%> shall be the <S%H3548>priest<s%>'s who offers <S%H7126>it.<s%>

Every meal <S%H4503>offering,<s%> <S%H1101>mixed<s%> with <S%H8081>oil<s%> or <S%H2720>dry,<s%> belongs to all the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> as well as <S%H251>another.<s%>
<S%H8451><s%>"'This is the law of the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of peace <S%H8002>offerings,<s%> which one shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

If he <S%H7126>offers<s%> it for a <S%H8426>thanksgiving,<s%> then he shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> with the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of <S%H8426>thanksgiving<s%> <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H2471>cakes<s%> <S%H1101>mixed<s%> with <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H7550>wafers<s%> <S%H4886>anointed<s%> with <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and <S%H2471>cakes<s%> <S%H1101>mixed<s%> with <S%H8081>oil.<s%>

With <S%H2471>cakes<s%> of <S%H2557>leavened<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> he shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> his <S%H7133>offering<s%> with the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of his peace <S%H8002>offerings<s%> for <S%H8426>thanksgiving.<s%>

Of it he shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> out of <S%H259>each<s%> <S%H7133>offering<s%> for a heave <S%H7133>offering<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> It shall be the <S%H3548>priest<s%>'s who sprinkles the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the peace <S%H8002>offerings.<s%>

The <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of his peace <S%H8002>offerings<s%> for <S%H8426>thanksgiving<s%> shall be <S%H398>eaten<s%> on the <S%H3117>day<s%> of his <S%H7133>offering.<s%> He shall not <S%H3240>leave<s%> any of it until the <S%H1242>morning.<s%>

<S%H2077><s%>"'But if the sacrifice of his <S%H7133>offering<s%> is a <S%H5088>vow,<s%> or a freewill <S%H5071>offering,<s%> it shall be <S%H398>eaten<s%> on the <S%H3117>day<s%> that he <S%H7126>offers<s%> his <S%H2077>sacrifice;<s%> and on the next <S%H4283>day<s%> what <S%H3498>remains<s%> of it shall be <S%H398>eaten:<s%>
but what <S%H3498>remains<s%> of the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> on the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> shall be <S%H8313>burned<s%> with <S%H784>fire.<s%>

If any of the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of his peace <S%H8002>offerings<s%> is <S%H398>eaten<s%> <S%H398>on<s%> the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> it will not be <S%H7521>accepted,<s%> neither shall it be <S%H2803>imputed<s%> to him who <S%H7126>offers<s%> <S%H6292>it.<s%> It will be an abomination, and the <S%H5315>soul<s%> who <S%H398>eats<s%> any of it will <S%H5375>bear<s%> his <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%>

<S%H1320><s%>"'The flesh that <S%H5060>touches<s%> any <S%H2931>unclean<s%> thing shall not be <S%H398>eaten.<s%> It shall be <S%H8313>burned<s%> with <S%H784>fire.<s%> As for the <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> everyone who is <S%H2889>clean<s%> may eat <S%H398>it;<s%>

but the <S%H5315>soul<s%> who <S%H398>eats<s%> of the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of peace <S%H8002>offerings,<s%> that belongs to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> having his <S%H2932>uncleanness<s%> on <S%H5315>him,<s%> that soul shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from his <S%H5971>people.<s%>

When <S%H5315>anyone<s%> <S%H5060>touches<s%> any <S%H2932>unclean<s%> <S%H2932>thing,<s%> the uncleanness of <S%H120>man,<s%> or an <S%H2932>unclean<s%> <S%H929>animal,<s%> or any <S%H2931>unclean<s%> <S%H8263>abomination,<s%> and <S%H398>eats<s%> some of the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of peace <S%H8002>offerings,<s%> which belong to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> that <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from his <S%H5971>people.<s%>'"
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>"Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H398><s%> 'You shall eat no <S%H2459>fat,<s%> of <S%H7794>bull,<s%> or <S%H3775>sheep,<s%> or <S%H5795>goat.<s%>

The <S%H2459>fat<s%> of that which dies of <S%H5038>itself,<s%> and the <S%H2459>fat<s%> of that which is torn of <S%H2966>animals,<s%> may be <S%H6213>used<s%> for any other <S%H4399>service,<s%> but you shall in no <S%H398>way<s%> eat of <S%H398>it.<s%>

For whoever <S%H398>eats<s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%> of the <S%H929>animal,<s%> of which men <S%H7126>offer<s%> an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> even the <S%H5315>soul<s%> who <S%H398>eats<s%> it shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from his <S%H5971>people.<s%>
You shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> any <S%H1818>blood,<s%> whether it is of <S%H5775>bird<s%> or of <S%H929>animal,<s%> in any of your <S%H4186>dwellings.<s%>
<S%H5315>Whoever<s%> it is who <S%H398>eats<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H1818>blood,<s%> that <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from his <S%H5971>people.<s%>'"
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>"Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H7126><s%> 'He who offers the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of his peace <S%H8002>offerings<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> shall <S%H935>bring<s%> his <S%H7133>offering<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> out of the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of his peace <S%H8002>offerings.<s%>

With his own <S%H3027>hands<s%> he shall <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H801>offerings<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> made by <S%H801>fire.<s%> He shall <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%> with the <S%H2373>breast,<s%> that the <S%H2373>breast<s%> may be <S%H5130>waved<s%> for a wave <S%H8573>offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> but the <S%H2373>breast<s%> shall be <S%H175>Aaron<s%>'s and his <S%H1121>sons<s%>'.

The <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H7785>thigh<s%> you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> to the <S%H3548>priest<s%> for a heave <S%H8641>offering<s%> out of the <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> of your peace <S%H8002>offerings.<s%>

He among the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> who <S%H7126>offers<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the peace <S%H8002>offerings,<s%> and the <S%H2459>fat,<s%> shall have the <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H7785>thigh<s%> for a <S%H4490>portion.<s%>

For the <S%H8573>waved<s%> <S%H2373>breast<s%> and the <S%H8641>heaved<s%> <S%H7785>thigh<s%> I have <S%H3947>taken<s%> from the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out of the <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> of their peace <S%H8002>offerings,<s%> and have <S%H5414>given<s%> them to <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> and to his <S%H1121>sons<s%> as their <S%H2706>portion<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> from the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>'"

This is the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> portion of <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> portion of his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> out of the <S%H801>offerings<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> made by <S%H801>fire,<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> when he <S%H7126>presented<s%> them to minister to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> in the <S%H3547>priest<s%>'s office;

which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> to be <S%H5414>given<s%> them of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that he <S%H4886>anointed<s%> <S%H2708>them.<s%> It is their portion <S%H5769>forever<s%> throughout their <S%H1755>generations.<s%>

This is the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> of the meal <S%H4503>offering,<s%> and of the sin <S%H2403>offering,<s%> and of the trespass <S%H817>offering,<s%> and of the <S%H4394>consecration,<s%> and of the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of peace <S%H8002>offerings;<s%>

which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> in <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai,<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H7126>offer<s%> their <S%H7133>offerings<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H5514>Sinai.<s%>
